Citations.Cited_Guidance: All abbreviations defined for a study version must be unique.

rule.Check:
study.versions.{
        "id": id,
        "versionIdentifier": versionIdentifier,
        "Duplicated abbreviations": ($filter(abbreviations,function($v,$i,$a)
                                        {$count($a[$.abbreviatedText=$v.abbreviatedText])>1})
                                        ~> $sort(function($l,$r){$l.abbreviatedText>$r.abbreviatedText}))
                                        .($join([abbreviatedText, expandedText],": ") &
                                            " " & $join(["[","]"],id)),
        "dataset": instanceType
    }[`Duplicated abbreviations`]
rule.Description: All abbreviations defined for a study version must be unique.

Outcome.Message: Duplicated abbreviations have been defined for the study version.
